title: My account was just BANNED for BOTTING?!
body:
I have been playing URF ever since it came out this patch. I had literally just finished a game and suddenly get this message. 

I have NEVER botted in MY LIFE. Under what exact evidence do they have to ban my account?! This is absolutely unbelievable.. I have NEVER had any issues on league, I am a good player. I do not bot, I do not smurf, I just play and enjoy it. This is unreliable. This needs to  be addressed **NOW**
